Title: Trust Me
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Gary Lennon, Vladimir Cvetko (executive story editor), Safia Dirie (story editor), Jeff Dix (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: As Mike and Angela try to ferret out the mole, she picks up a lead while trying to firm up Tommy's alibi; Tasha gets a warning, Tariq makes a dangerous new friend; and Milan orders that a new product be pushed.
